channel.title: Projects on Jelmer Snoeck
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jelmer Snoeck

item.title: Experiment
item.description: A Go package for experimenting with and evaluating new codepaths without impacting your end users.

item.title: Manifold Kubernetes Operator
item.description: A Kubernetes Operator to manage secrets stored in Manifold. This enables your developers to store their credentials securely with Manifold, and load them accordingly in your Kubernetes clusters.

item.title: Terraform Manifold
item.description: A Terraform provider to manage resources on Manifold, allowing you to store and read credentials through Terraform.

item.title: Terraform Aiven
item.description: A Terraform provider to provision resources with Aiven. This project has been officially handed off to the Aiven team.
